name: weak-armor
effect: Whenever a physical move hits this Pokémon, its Speed rises one stage and its Defense falls one stage. This ability triggers on every hit of a multiple-hit move.
short_effect: Raises Speed and lowers Defense by one stage each upon being hit by a physical move.

flavor_text.sword_shield: Physical attacks to the Pokémon lower its Defense stat but sharply raise its Speed stat.
